links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
'''Trilogy Tuesday''' was an event on December 16, 2003 in which theaters around the world showed all three of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]] films by Sir [[Peter Jackson]] consecutively, ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King|The Return of the King]]'' being played at midnight of the day it was released.
